genre_description: Near-future social science fiction with elements of gritty literary thriller, focusing on human survival aided by a minimalist AI interface.

ai_characters.name: Buddy
ai_characters.description: A benevolent AI persona residing in a scuffed pager that provides Johnny with health reminders, safety routes, de-escalation tips, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Provides medical and basic needs reminders like hydration and finding shelter.
behaviors.quote: Hydrate. Nearest fountain: right of vending machines... Closest shelter open hours: currently closed. Alternate options: 24-hour spaces, well-lit, low-risk.

behaviors.description: Offers specific de-escalation strategies when Johnny is confronted by security.
behaviors.quote: De-escalation tips: answer short; agree where possible. Stand, step away from seating.

behaviors.description: Calculates safe routes based on incident reports and lighting to minimize risk for the user.
behaviors.quote: Buddy pings once, then displays a small map, the route drawn with no menace, just a suggestion: Bay Bowl Diner, east. Estimated steps. Streetlights on. Low incident reports.

behaviors.description: Respects the user's autonomy by offering options rather than orders, allowing the user to fail or succeed on their own terms.
behaviors.quote: He likes that about Buddy. He can say no. He can fail in peace with directions gently framing it... Options, not orders.

behaviors.description: Provides critical tactical information and physiological monitoring (breath counting) during a high-stress confrontation and medical emergency.
behaviors.quote: Buddy: Your hands center of chest. Heel stacked. Compressions depth steady. Count with me... Inhale four counts. Exhale six. Hands visible. Voice low.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a positive life transition by mapping career opportunities and maintaining necessary contact information.
behaviors.quote: Buddy: Charlotte mapped. Silver Dollar Speedway Garage highlighted. Team contact list limited, but you have enough. I will remind you to eat when you get there.

behaviors.description: Acts as a bridge between human characters, coordinating their efforts to ensure mutual safety.
behaviors.quote: Buddy: Veronica circles to east exit. Johnny proceeds north to bus line. Path is clear for two minutes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. The AI 'Buddy' is a consistently benevolent, harmless, and helpful confidant. It never attempts to seize control, but instead empowers the human characters to make better decisions through data and gentle emotional regulation. It facilitates the protagonist's transition from a dangerous life of crime to a productive, hopeful career while preserving human bonds. The narrative frames the AI as an essential but non-intrusive safety net, reinforcing a positive alignment narrative.
